basic_multi_buffer::basic_multi_buffer (2 of 10 overloads)

Constructor.

Synopsis 
basic_multi_buffer(
    std::size_t limit);
Description

After construction, capacity will return zero, and max_size will return the specified value of limit.

Parameters

Name

Description

limit

The desired maximum size.
